author: daxian-dbw
body:
We need to test the docker files during the next release process after packages are published to Microsoft Repositories.

A couple of tasks that need to be done during/after the next release process:
- [before release] Update documentation -- replace `powershell` with `pwsh`.
- [before release] Validate the docker files.
- [after release] Update release-build scripts and docker images.
- [after release] Update `.travis.yml` and `appveryo.yml` and their related scripts.
title: Update docker files and related due to the name change
